berber.text: "He who rides a camel should not be afraid of dogs."
"The barking of the dogs will not disturb the clouds."
"When a thief finds nothing to steal he will steal a dagger made of sand."
"Boil the water and the scum will rise to the top."
"If you open the eyes of a blind man he wants to go back to the darkness."
"The prayer of the innocent has no wings."
